text: The real property described as Lot 120, Square 5129, and any improvements thereon, shall be exempt from the tax imposed by Chapter 8 of this title during tax years 2011, 2012, 2013, 2014, and 2015; provided, that the total tax exemption provided by this section shall not exceed $140,000.
historical:
Emergency Act Amendments

For temporary (90 day) addition of § 47-4649, see § 722(b) of Fiscal Year 2011 Supplemental Budget Support Emergency Act of 2010 (D.C. Act 18-694, January 19, 2011, 58 DCR 662).

Legislative History of Laws

For history of Law 18-370, see notes under § 47-143.

Miscellaneous Notes

Short title: Section 721 of D.C. Law 18-370 provided that subtitle C of title VII of the act may be cited as "4427 Hayes Street, N.E., Real Property Tax Abatement Act of 2010".

DC CODE § 47-4649

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Taxation, Licensing, Permits, Assessments, and Fees. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Abatement of real property taxes for 4427 Hayes Street, N.E.
